turns.content: write 1 on 1 sales email after meeting someone one at an event and pitching it services to them

Subject: Following up on our meeting at the [event name]

Dear [Name],

I hope this email finds you well. It was great to meet you at the [event name] last week and hear about your company's [briefly describe their company/needs]. I was particularly impressed by your insights on [topic discussed during meeting].

As we discussed, I wanted to follow up on the opportunity to introduce our [company name] services. Our team specializes in [briefly describe what services your company offers and how it can help their business]. I strongly believe that our services could benefit your company in terms of [briefly describe key benefits of your services].

I would love to set up a call to discuss in further detail how we can help and answer any questions you may have. Let me know if there's a specific day or time that works best for you, or if you would prefer to set up a meeting in-person.

Thank you again for your time, and I look forward to speaking with you soon.

Best regards,

[Your Name]
[Your Title]
[Company Name]
[Phone number]
[Email]
